title: Asylum on Saint Helena
itunes:title: Asylum on Saint Helena
itunes:subtitle: Annina Van Neel showed me around Saint Helena, a small scrap of land in the middle of the Atlantic Ocean. This island is the most significant physical trace of the Transatlantic slave trade middle passage.
description:
Annina Van Neel showed me around Saint Helena, a small scrap of land in the middle of the Atlantic Ocean. This island is the most significant physical trace of the Transatlantic slave trade middle passage.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
